Containers.Name: github-runner
Containers.Overview:
[b]Description[/b] A self hosted github action runner in docker image.
Because most of the existing one doesn't work properly, so here I am (here we are)
[b]Configuration[/b] [b]URL[/b] Replace the value with your correct link of GitHub Organization/ Repository [b]TOKEN[/b] replace the value with your actual token for self-hosted runner
[b]Documentation[/b] https://github.com/tenent007963/unraid-docker/github-runner/readme.md[br]
[b]Notes[/b] N/A

Variable.Name: URL
Variable.Value: [Replace this with your organization link / repository link]
